item.title: Obsidian: Knowledge base
item.description: üóÑÔ∏è Obsidian: Knowledge Organization A couple of days ago, I shared the tool I use to manage all my knowledge base, and I had promised to share the systems I use to organize and record knowledge and information about my habits. This time I want to share how I organize my notes and the things I learn. Personally, I am a software developer, so I have a specific space for the knowledge and resources I gather about technologies that interest me, and since that’s my most “nourished” space, it will be the one I use as an example.
